## Source: ossf-package-analysis (8cc4270f1a4ae1db6b519e37e84074a5596af59f15657e499996ee0d6fde3958)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'sap-autofixforcedest' @ 0.0.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
